emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Development Environments
emerging_technologies.description: Environments where AI not only assists but also autonomously writes, tests, and deploys code based on high-level requirements.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces entry barriers for software development, potentially leading to an increase in software quality and innovation. Raises questions about the role of human developers.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Dependent on the reliability of AI in producing secure, scalable, and maintainable code; integration with existing workflows; ethical considerations regarding AI-generated code.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Interface Wearables
emerging_technologies.description: Wearable devices that translate brain activity into digital commands, allowing for hands-free control of technology.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhancement of human capabilities, privacy concerns regarding brain data, and potential for misuse in surveillance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Acceptance of brain-computer interfaces, advancements in non-invasive technology, and regulatory approval for medical applications.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Secure Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain technology resistant to quantum computing attacks, ensuring long-term data integrity and privacy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Critical for securing financial transactions and sensitive data in the era of quantum computing.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Progress in quantum computing, regulatory environment for blockchain technologies, and the need for secure data storage.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Planning
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that optimize urban layouts, traffic flow, and resource distribution for sustainable city growth.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for more efficient cities but raises concerns about privacy, decision-making transparency, and employment in urban planning.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Political will, public trust in AI systems for critical infrastructure, and integration with existing city planning tools.

emerging_technologies.name: Space Resource Extraction
emerging_technologies.description: Automated mining operations on asteroids or other celestial bodies for valuable resources.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize manufacturing and energy sectors, but involves international legal frameworks, environmental concerns, and economic implications.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, international cooperation, economic viability, and advancements in space travel technology.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: Tools like Copilot and Cursor_ai have become standard in software development for code completion, error detection, and debugging.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted by developers for enhancing productivity and reducing mundane coding tasks.

mainstream_technologies.name: Electric Vertical Take-Off and Landing (eVTOL) Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Air taxis for urban mobility, reducing road congestion and offering point-to-point transportation.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Initially used for luxury or emergency services, becoming more common with regulatory approval and infrastructure development.

epoch_themes.description: AI is not just an assistant but an autonomous creator, manager, and executor across multiple industries.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Significant changes in job markets, necessitating re-skilling, ethical debates on AI autonomy, and potential for increased productivity and efficiency.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Shift towards knowledge-based economies, increased focus on AI ethics and governance.

epoch_themes.description: Cities evolve to be more sustainable through technology, focusing on energy, transport, and resource management.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Reduces carbon footprints, improves quality of life, but could increase disparities between urban and rural areas.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Urbanization, green technology, and smart city initiatives.
